item.title: Npc Problem [525]

item.description:
@oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo wrote:

well my server already has a jad npc but for some reason it wonâ€™t show on my server
i know the client has the model cause everything is right , but i put the coords of were jad is and when i got here jad is never there, can somone tell me what the problem is.

if (npcType == 2745) { if (currentHP >= 1) { if (!spawnedHealers) { if (currentHP <= 180) { for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) Server.engine.newNPC(2746, 2400 + Misc.random(2), 5144 + Misc.random(2), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, spawnedFor); spawnedHealers = true; } }

and here is his where i put the coords

case 2745: p.setCoords(2409, 5102, 0); Server.engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6570, 1); Server.engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6529, 8029); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(s, "Congratiolations, You've beaten Tztok-Jad."); p.requestAnim(862, 0);
